alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 7:35PM CST until February 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Lena. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor flooding of agricultural and pasture land is occurring along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 23.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Pearl River Lena 24.0 23.0 Mon 6 pm CST 23.6 24.0 23.4 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 745 AM CST.
